layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x24
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x24
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x0 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 385x19
          text run at (0,0) width 385: "The entire viewport should be green and there should be no red."
